section.title: Example
section.source: <mak:list from="best.Student s" offset="$offset" limit="$limit" defaultLimit="25" orderBy="s.name"> <mak:pagination action="studentList.jsp" title="true" itemName="Students" /> <mak:value expr="s.person.name"/>, born on <mak:value expr="s.person.birthdate" /> <mak:pagination action="studentList.jsp" title="true" itemName="Students" /> </mak:list>
